title: BRIEF-Fortress Global Says Working With Stakeholders To Develop Potential Transaction Structures
text:
BRIEF-Fortress Global Says Working With Stakeholders To Develop Potential Transaction Structures

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 27, 2019 18:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fortress Global Says Working With Stakeholders To Develop Potential Transaction Structures Sept 27 (Reuters) - Fortress Global Enterprises Inc : * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES PROVIDES CORPORATE UPDATE * FORTRESS GLOBAL - HAS BEEN WORKING WITH CERTAIN STAKEHOLDERS AND THIRD PARTIES TO DEVELOP AND EVALUATE VARIOUS POTENTIAL TRANSACTION STRUCTURES * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES INC - CONTINUES TO EXECUTE ON ITS STRATEGIC AND FINANCING INITIATIVE * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES - GIOVANNI IADELUCA CO'S PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER, WILL BE APPOINTED AS A DIRECTOR EFFECTIVE OCTOBER 1

BRIEF-Fortress Global Says Working With Stakeholders To Develop Potential Transaction Structures
